dcterms:creator: Y. Ma
K.-S. Jun
L. Li
X. Zhu
dcterms:description: This dataset is used to study data poisoning attacks in contextual bandits, where the attacker can manipulate the rewards in the data before the bandit algorithm updates.
dcterms:title: Contextual Bandit Algorithm

dcterms:creator: L. Li
W. Chu
J. Langford
R. E. Schapire
dcterms:description: This dataset is utilized for personalized news article recommendation using a contextual-bandit approach.
dcterms:title: Stochastic Bandits

dcterms:creator: N. Korda
E. Kaufmann
R. Munos
dcterms:description: This dataset is focused on Thompson sampling for 1-dimensional exponential family bandits, providing insights into the performance of this algorithm.
dcterms:title: Thompson Sampling for Gaussian Distributions

dcterms:creator: K.-S. Jun
L. Li
Y. Ma
X. Zhu
dcterms:description: This dataset examines adversarial attacks on stochastic bandits, focusing on the manipulation of rewards to control the bandit algorithm's behavior.
dcterms:title: Adversarial Attacks on Stochastic Bandits

dcterms:creator: B. Biggio
B. Nelson
P. Laskov
dcterms:description: This dataset is used to study poisoning attacks against support vector machines, providing insights into vulnerabilities in machine learning models.
dcterms:title: Data Poisoning Attacks Against Support Vector Machines

dcterms:creator: B. Li
Y. Wang
A. Singh
Y. Vorobeychik
dcterms:description: This dataset investigates data poisoning attacks on factorization-based collaborative filtering, highlighting vulnerabilities in recommendation systems.
dcterms:title: Data Poisoning Attacks on Factorization-Based Collaborative Filtering

dcterms:creator: S. Huang
N. Papernot
I. Goodfellow
Y. Duan
P. Abbeel
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on adversarial attacks on neural network policies, exploring vulnerabilities in reinforcement learning systems.
dcterms:title: Adversarial Attacks on Neural Network Policies

dcterms:creator: Y. Wang
K. Chaudhuri
dcterms:description: This dataset examines data poisoning attacks against online learning systems, highlighting vulnerabilities in adaptive learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: Data Poisoning Attacks Against Online Learning

dcterms:creator: Y.-C. Lin
Z.-W. Hong
Y.-H. Liao
M.-L. Shih
M.-Y. Liu
M. Sun
dcterms:description: This dataset explores tactics of adversarial attacks on deep reinforcement learning agents, providing insights into vulnerabilities in these systems.
dcterms:title: Tactics of Adversarial Attack on Deep Reinforcement Learning Agents

dcterms:creator: A. Garivier
T. Lattimore
E. Kaufmann
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses explore-then-commit strategies in bandit algorithms, providing insights into exploration-exploitation trade-offs.
dcterms:title: Explore-Then-Commit Strategies
